## Quaternion.toMatrix4x4() method

Convert this quaternion to a 4x4 rotation matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toMatrix4x4(matrix?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix, if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix.

## Remarks

Only left top 3x3 part of the matrix will be changed.
